programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: From Italy with Amore
programme.desc: In the quest to find her dream man, Ariel meets Daniel who shows that food is the way to her heart.

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: When Isla’s art unexpectedly sells to Mark, a second commission sees them falling in love.

programme.title: Falling For the Competition
programme.desc: A local mom’s and dad’s group clash for the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year award.

programme.title: Love and the Radio Star
programme.desc: Hired to rebrand a radio show, Savannah finds herself falling in love after working with the host.

programme.title: Heart of the Manor
programme.desc: Real-estate agent Lisa competes with developer Matthew who wants to buy her family's manor.

programme.title: Family in Hiding
programme.desc: Single mother witnesses DA's murder, enters protection with her teens, facing a life-altering ordeal.

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Teen witnesses mother's shooting, hides with a cop, facing danger as they evade the killer together.

programme.title: Fatal Performance
programme.desc: A struggling actress is hired to impersonate a woman for a business meeting, but soon finds her life in danger.

programme.title: My Daddy is In Heaven
programme.desc: Becca and Adam Smith along with their 5-year-old daughter Acie are a perfect family until a tragedy strikes.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: On Gamma Fair day, Sarah skips out. Bundy saves Kappa Psi Psi's auction, but pays the price later.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: Charley, the founder of a dating app must team up with marketing expert Liam, to save her company.

programme.title: Just for Showmance
programme.desc: Tara marries Joe, a stranger as part of a TV show, but soon starts to fall for him after all.

programme.title: Love at First Like
programme.desc: A journalist covering the Don Juan of dating apps ends up finding there's more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sister’s manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: Love Served Here
programme.desc: A chef bets she can turn around the worst restaurant in the city but ends up falling for the owner.

programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie meets her match with new client Ryan, whose daughters are her biggest fan.

programme.title: Tenebre
programme.desc: A writer arrives in Rome only to find that somebody is using his novels as the inspiration and occasionally the means of committing murder. As the death toll mounts the police are more and more baffled, and the writer becomes more closely linked to the case than is comfortable.

programme.title: Nightmare
programme.desc: A mental-patient, who is troubled with horrible nightmares, has escaped from his hospital. Now on the streets he can’t help killing innocent people. But there is one family he is more than interested in and when he tries to kill them, he finds that it’s not that easy.

Before long Eve escapes to mate with Ross.
